interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nail Files and Buffers, Teenitor 16PCS Professional Nail Manicure Tool for Acrylic Nails, 100/180 and 120/240 Grits Emery Boards 120 Grits Nail Buffer Block for Shaping and Buffing Nails
Review Date: 2020/01/14
Store: Teenitor
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: My experience with these buffer files is only for using them with dip powder nails. I always do my own and have been buying buffer blocks from the local beauty supply store for years for .99 cents. When I saw these, I thought that it would be perfect for me. I was wrong. These blocks do absolutely nothing. I tried to use them all. There is very little grit on the blocks at all so it was a task trying to smooth the surface of my nail. If you are needing them for something else they may work for you. But I wouldn't advice them if you are getting them to do your own nails.
Review Title: Terrible for buffing dip powder
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
UV Light for Nails,LKE Curing Lamp for Gel Nail Polish 54W UV Led Light Gel Nail Starter Kit Nail Dryer Accessories
LKE
{'Brand': 'LKE', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Number of Light Sources': '2', 'Wattage': '54 watts', 'Control Method': 'App', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.45 x 8.7 x 5.08 inches; 2 Pounds', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required.'}
This lamp is super easy to use. After installing the batteries you just turn it on the length of time that you need and you are ready to go. I do dip powder nails, not gel... but everytime I have been to the salon, they have always used a lamp to help cure the top layer faster. This worked exactly the same. Anything that saves me time is a great thing! I would recommend this. the price is great and the product is even better!
Easy to use
UMICKOO Hair Straightener,Upgraded Flat Iron for Hair With Real-Time Temperature Display And Adjustable Temperature,1 Inch (Rose Gold)
UMIKOO
{'Package Dimensions': '14.48 x 4.61 x 2.32 inches; 1.79 Pounds', 'UPC': '692232543075'}
I really like this straightener for the most part. I'm not sure how... but my hair (and my daughters) seems to come from the wand so much shinier. It has an adjustable temperature setting, it does lock closed. It even comes with a bag to keep it in and a glove to wear while you are using it... which is where I have my problem. The way it opens leaves my hand too close to the heat which results in easily getting burned. Which isn't a problem if you wear the glove... but being honest, I'm not going to use a heat shield glove every day to do my hair. I only use one of these **sometimes** when I am using a curling wand. So for me that is a huge con. It also comes with two hair clips to help separate the sections of your hair. For the price... Its a great wand. You will get used to where you need to hold your hand.
pros and cons
Mountain Falls 100% Acetone Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, Maximum Strength, 8 Fluid Ounce
Mountain Falls
["Don't wait for your next spa day to treat yourself. Mountain Falls 100% Acetone Nail Polish Remover has been carefully formulated to quickly and gently care for your nails. The 100% acetone formula helps remove even the toughest polish, glitter, tips and artificial nails. Our formula is free of Parabens and Phthalates."]
{'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '8 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 2 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'}
I do my own dip nails so I need a strong acetone based product to remove the nails when I am ready to take them off. This did not disappoint. Great product and a great price. I will use this again!
Very strong
6 Pcs Pink Baby Girl Hair Bow Clips Set, Alligator Clip Hair Accessories with Gift Box, Back to School Dress
Amacle
{'Brand': 'Amacle', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 6 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '743811744526'}
My daughter is 4 and FINALLY has hair long enough to wear big bows. We have always used the Wee one bows and they are great but they always slip out of her fine hair. The quality of the bow material isn't as good as the wee ones but they are still great. BUT the clip is what makes all of the difference in these bows. They are little teeth so they stay in her hair like the others do not. plus the price. I'm used to paying $13 for one bow... so I am obviously thrilled with these bows!
LOVE
Nail Files and Buffers, Teenitor 16PCS Professional Nail Manicure Tool for Acrylic Nails, 100/180 and 120/240 Grits Emery Boards 120 Grits Nail Buffer Block for Shaping and Buffing Nails
Teenitor
{'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
My experience with these buffer files is only for using them with dip powder nails. I always do my own and have been buying buffer blocks from the local beauty supply store for years for .99 cents. When I saw these, I thought that it would be perfect for me. I was wrong. These blocks do absolutely nothing. I tried to use them all. There is very little grit on the blocks at all so it was a task trying to smooth the surface of my nail. If you are needing them for something else they may work for you. But I wouldn't advice them if you are getting them to do your own nails.
Terrible for buffing dip powder
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Preferences:** Continues to prioritize convenience and ease of use in beauty tools, particularly in hair care and nail-related items for at-home grooming. Recently broadened interest to include children's hair accessories, emphasizing practicality and performance.
- **Usage Type:** Primarily engages with dip powder nails while also exploring hair accessories that enhance functionality for different hair types, particularly for fine hair in children.
- **Product Selection:** Chooses items that promote efficiency and effectiveness, demonstrating a willingness to invest in products that address specific needs. However, recent experiences indicate a growing emphasis on product performance, especially regarding nail care tools.
- **Rating Patterns:** Generally offers positive ratings but has recently encountered dissatisfaction due to unmet expectations in product functionality, leading to a stark negative review. This highlights a critical approach in evaluating products that align with specific grooming requirements.
- **Brand Affinity:** Prefers brands known for reliability and user-friendly designs, maintaining consistency in selecting high-quality products for both personal and family use while now requiring more rigorous effectiveness from tools.
- **Review Behavior:** Engages in detailed feedback that emphasizes practical benefits and usability, with recent reviews reflecting a shift from positive to critical observations, pointing out specific shortcomings in product performance.

Overall, the user values strong functionality, convenience, quality, and cost-effectiveness in their purchases across nail care and hair accessories. Their latest interaction underscores a re-evaluation of product expectations, particularly regarding the effectiveness of tools for personal grooming.
